con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://webservice.caaers.cabig.nci.nih.gov" xmlns:tns="http://webservice.caaers.cabig.nci.nih.gov" xmlns:wsdlsoap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:soap12="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenc11="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:soapenc12="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:soap11="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://webservice.caaers.cabig.nci.nih.gov" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://webservice.caaers.cabig.nci.nih.gov"> <xs:element name="studies"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The top level (typically root) element. Allows the definition of default values for all nested bean definitions.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" ref="study"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="DomainObject"> <xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:integer"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="MutableDomainObject"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="DomainObject"> <xs:attribute name="version" type="xs:integer"/> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="study" type="study"/> <xs:complexType name="study"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="MutableDomainObject"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="shortTitle" type="CustomStringType"/> <xs:element name="longTitle" type="CustomStringType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="precis" type="CustomStringType"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="description" type="CustomStringType"/> <xs:element name="phaseCode" type="StudyPhaseType"/> <xs:element name="status" type="StatusType"/> <xs:element name="multiInstitutionIndicator" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element name="adeersReporting" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="otherMeddra" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element ref="aeTerminology"/> <xs:element ref="diseaseTerminology"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="design" type="DesignCodeType"/> maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="radiationTherapyType" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="surgeryTherapyType" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element ref="researchStaff"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="siteInvestigator" type="SiteInvestigatorType"/> maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="nciIdentifier" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="organization" type="OrganizationType"/> base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Active - Trial is open to accrual"/> <xs:enumeration value="Administratively Complete"/> <xs:enumeration value="Approved - Trial has official CTEP approval"/> <xs:enumeration value="Temporarily Closed to Accrual & Treatment"/> <xs:enumeration value="Temporarily Closed to Accrual"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType
